original: nārāyaṇaḥ paraṃ brahma gītāśāstre samīritaḥ // YGas_1 //
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ param brahma gītā śāstre samīritaḥ
jñāna karma ātmike niṣṭhe yoga lakṣe su saṃskṛte
ātma anubhūti siddhyā arthe pūrva ṣaṭkena coditaḥ
karma dhīḥ bhaktiḥ iti ādi pūrva śeṣaḥ ntima uditaḥ
asthāna sneha kāruṇya dharma adharma dhiyā ākulam

original: pārthaṃ prapannam uddiśya śāstrāvatraṇaṃ kṛtam // YGas_5 //
analyzed: pārtham prapannam uddiśya śāstra avatraṇam kṛtam
nitya ātma āsaṅga karma iha gocarā sāṃkhya yoga dhīḥ
dvitīye sthita dhī lakṣyā proktā tad moha śāntaye
asaktyā loka rakṣāyai guṇeṣu āropya

original: sarveśvare vā nyasyoktā tṛtīye karmakāryatā // YGas_7 //
analyzed: sarveśvare vā nyasya uktā tṛtīye karma kārya tā
prasaṅgāt sva svabhāva uktiḥ karmaṇaḥ karmatā asya ca

original: bhedā jñānasya māhātmyam caturthādhyāya ucyate // YGas_8 //
analyzed: bhedāḥ jñānasya māhātmyam caturtha adhyāye ucyate
karma yogasya saukaryam śaighryam kāścana tadvidhāḥ
ca pañcama adhyāye ucyate

original: yogasiddhaḥ svayogasya pāramyaṃ ṣaṣṭha ucyate // YGas_10 //
analyzed: yogasiddhaḥ sva yogasya pāramyam ṣaṣṭhaḥ ucyate
sva yāthātmyam prakṛtyā asya tirodhiḥ śaraṇa āgatiḥ

original: bhaktabhedaḥ prabuddhasya śraiṣṭhyaṃ saptama ucyate // YGas_11 //
analyzed: bhakta bhedaḥ prabuddhasya śraiṣṭhyam saptamaḥ ucyate
aiśvarya akṣara yāthātmyam bhagavat caraṇa arthiṇām
vedya upādeya bhāvānām aṣṭame bhede ucyate
sva māhātmyam manuṣya tve para tvam ca mahātmanām

original: viśeṣo navame yogo bhaktirūpaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // YGas_13 //
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ navame yogaḥ bhakti rūpaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
bhakti utpatti vivṛdhi arthā vistīrṇā daśamā uditā
ekādaśe yāthātmya sākṣātkāra avalokanam

original: dattam uktā vidiprāptyor bhaktyekopāyatā tathā // YGas_15 //
analyzed: dattam uktā vidi prāptyoḥ bhakti eka upāya tā tathā
bhakti śraiṣṭhyam upāya uktiḥ aśaktasya ātma niṣṭha tā

original: tatprakārās tv atiprītir bhakte dvādaśa ucyate // YGas_16 //
analyzed: tad prakārāḥ tu atiprītiḥ bhakte dvādaśaḥ ucyate

original: bandhahetur vivekaś ca trayodaśa udīryate // YGas_17 //
analyzed: bandha hetuḥ vivekaḥ ca trayodaśaḥ udīryate
guṇa bandha vidhau teṣām kartṛ tvam tad nivartanam
acit miśrāt viśuddhāt ca cetanāt puruṣottamaḥ

original: vyāpānād bharaṇāt svāmyād anyaḥ pañcadaśoditaḥ // YGas_19 //
analyzed: vyāpānāt bharaṇāt svāmyāt anyaḥ pañcadaśa uditaḥ
deva asura vibhāga ukti pūrvikā śāstra vaśyatā
tattva anuṣṭhāna vijñāna sthemne ṣoḍaśaḥ ucyate

original: aśāstram āsuraṃ kṛtsnam śāstrīyaṃ guṇataḥ pṛthak /
analyzed: a śāstram āsuram kṛtsnam śāstrīyam guṇataḥ pṛthak
lakṣaṇam śāstra siddhasya tridhā saptadaśa uditam
īśvare kartṛ tā buddhiḥ sattva upādeya tā antime
sva karma pariṇāmaḥ ca śāstra sāra arthaḥ ucyate
karma yogaḥ tapaḥ tīrtha dāna yajña ādi sevanam
jñāna yogaḥ jita svāntaiḥ pariśuddha ātmani sthitiḥ

original: trayānām api yogānāṃ tribhir anyonyasaṃgamaḥ // YGas_24 //
analyzed: trayānām api yogānām tribhiḥ anyonya saṃgamaḥ
nitya naimittikānām ca para ārādhana rūpiṇam

original: ātmaṛṣṭes trayo 'py ete yogadvāreṇa sādhakāḥ // YGas_25 //
analyzed: ātma ṛṣṭeḥ trayaḥ pi ete yoga dvāreṇa sādhakāḥ
nirasta nikhila ajñānaḥ dṛṣṭvā ātmānam para anugam

original: pratilabhya parāṃ bhaktiṃ tayaivāvāpnoti tatpadam // YGas_26 //
analyzed: pratilabhya parām bhaktim tayā eva avāpnoti tat padam

original: ātmārthī cet trayo 'py ete tatkaivalyasya sādhakāḥ // YGas_27 //
analyzed: ātma arthī ced ete tad kaivalyasya sādhakāḥ
aikāntyam bhagavati eṣām samānam adhikāriṇām

original: yāvatprāpti parārthī cet tad evātyantam aśunute // YGas_28 //
analyzed: yāvatprāpti para arthī ced tat eva atyantam a śunute
tad saṃśleṣa viyoga eka sukha duḥkhaḥ tad eka dhīḥ
nija karma ādi bhakti antam kuryāt prītyā eva kāritaḥ

original: upāyatāṃ parityajya nyasyed deve tu tām abhīḥ // YGas_31 //
analyzed: upāya tām parityajya nyasyet deve tu tām

original: tatpradhānam idaṃ śāstram iti gītārthasaṃgrahaṃ // YGas_32 //
analyzed: tad pradhānam idam śāstram iti gīta artha saṃgraham
